import React from "react"; import solarEnergy from '../assets/Content pages/solarEnergy.png' import styles from './content.css' let contentBtn = document.getElementsByClassName('content-button'); for(let i = 0; i < contentBtn.length; i++ ){ contentBtn[i].addEventListener('click', function (){ this.classList.toggle('active') let content = this.nextSibling(); }) } const Content = () => { return (

Our commitment to green energy is paving the way for a cleaner, healthier planet.

Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity. Photovoltaic (PV) cells on these panels capture the energy from the sun and convert it into electrical power.
